resources.string:
Matts Slide Puzzle is an implementation of the classic slide number puzzle.

The goal is to order the tiles 1 through 8, with the BLANK in the bottom right hand corner.

Tap the solve button to see it in action.

There are over 180,000 possible puzzles, ranging 0-31 moves away from the goal.

Happy puzzling!
